name: Neuronvisio
tagline: A Graphical User Interface with 3D Visualization features for NEURON simulation enviroment
body:
What is it
----------

Neuronvisio is a Graphical User Interface for [NEURON simulator
environment](http://www.neuron.yale.edu/neuron/). Neuronvisio connect with NEURON using the new python
NEURON interface.

![Pyramidal Neuron Voltage change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mattions/neuronvisio/master/docs/_static/pyramidal_3D_change_voltage.png)

Features
--------

-   3D visualization of the model with the possibility to change it
    runtime
-   Creation of vectors to record any variables present in the section
-   Pylab integration to plot directly the result of the simulation
-   Exploration of the timecourse of any variable among time using a
    color coded scale
-   the GUI runs in its own thread so itâ€™s possible to use the console
    (integrated with IPython)
-   automatically download and load models from [ModelDB](http://senselab.med.yale.edu/modeldb/)

Documumentation avaialble at http://docs.neuronvisio.org
